麔字的基本解释

麔
jiù
雄性麋鹿。

麔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiù］
［《廣韻》其九切，上有，羣。］
麋鹿中的雄性称麔。

麔字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麔； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1510第27
【唐韻】其九切【集韻】【韻會】巨九切，?音舅。牡麋也。【爾雅·釋獸】麋，牡麔。　又【爾雅·釋獸】麔麚，短脰。【疏】皆短項也。　又【集韻】居勞切，音高。又巨夭切，趫上聲。又被表切，音莩。義?同。○按麔字諸書牝牡稱混，當以《爾雅》爲正。

麔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
麔字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhong
Basic explanation of words
Zhong
jiù
Male elk.
Zhong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiù］
["Guangyun" has nine cuts, there are on it, group. ]
The male of the elk is called Zhong.
Zhong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Deer Department] 　麔; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1510 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Its nine cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] The huge nine cuts, uncle sound. Moose too. [Erya·Shiju] Moose, Mu Zhong.　[Erya·Shiju] Zhong Zhong, short 脰. 【Sparse】All short items are also short.　[Jiyun] Ju Laoche, pitch. Juyao cut again and sounded. It was cut again by the table, Yinhan. Righteous? Same. ○ According to the word "Zhong", "Mumu" is called mixed, and "Erya" should be regarded as the positive.
